pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wrapper for the 'Intro.js' Library // A wrapper for the 'Intro.js' library (For more info: https://introjs.com/). This package makes it easy to include step-by-step introductions, and clickable hints in a 'Shiny' application. It supports both static introductions in the UI, and programmatic introductions from the server-side.
